{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNDRMAC |revision=v1 |upc=606449077674 |asin=B005E5281A |est_release_date=06/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY308300092 |ic_id=4054A-08300092 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7161 |cpu1_cspeed=680 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9220 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9223 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8366SR |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=DFS |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=NETGEARXX,NETGEARXX-5G |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$,,,^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}-5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=E0:46:9A |oui_eth=E0:46:9A }} '''Wireless Router for View & Gaming'''
[http://www.netgear.com/home/products/wirelessrouters/high-performance/WNDRMAC.aspx Product page] :{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WNDRMACv1|vs_id=18861}}
The default SSIDs appear to be '''NETGEARXX''' (2.4GHz) and '''NETGEARXX-5G''' (5GHz). :[https://lists.openwrt.org/pipermail/openwrt-devel/2012-June/015699.html ''OpenWrt-Devel'']
*[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/netgear-wndrmac.shtml Review on '''iXBT'''] :[[Netgear WNDRMACv2]] RAM: 128 MB ([[Netgear WNDR3800]])
